game.name: SEARCH ALL - BONES
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 터치 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the bones in a large location. The bones will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the bones in a large location. The bones will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places.
